name: Botmonster TAURI DEV 10 08 2025
description: A sophisticated order flow trading software for Binance Spot, featuring Volume Profile, Fair Value Gaps (FVG), Order Blocks (OB), and AI-powered analysis from Gemini. It provides a beautiful and professional interface for technical traders.
prompt: As a world-class senior frontend engineer and UI/UX expert, review the current trading terminal. Proactively identify and implement a significant improvement to the application's user interface, functionality, or performance. Focus on a change that provides high value to a technical trader.
